name: Grilled Fish
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a shallow dish, combine the fish fillets, minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper. Let marinate for 15-20 minutes.
Brush the grill grates with olive oil.
Place the marinated fish fillets on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
Serve the grilled fish with lemon wedges and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Mutton Biryani
steps: Marinate the mutton pieces with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, chili powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Soak the basmati rice in water for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions until golden brown.
Add the marinated mutton and cook until the meat is tender.
Drain the rice and layer it over the cooked mutton.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes.
Fluff the biryani with a fork and serve hot with raita.

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Cut the beef into thin strips.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions until translucent.
Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture.
Add the beef strips and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in the sour cream, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Cook the egg noodles according to package instructions.
Serve the beef stroganoff over the cooked egg noodles, garnished with chopped parsley.

name: Shrimp Tacos
steps: Peel and devein the shrimp. Pat them dry with paper towels.
In a bowl, combine the shrimp, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and lime juice. Toss to coat.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the shrimp until cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Warm the corn tortillas according to package instructions.
To assemble the tacos, place some shredded cabbage in each tortilla, top with the cooked shrimp, diced avocado, and a squeeze of fresh lime juice.

name: Pork Chops with Applesauce
steps: Season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sear the pork chops for 3-4 minutes per side until golden brown.
Transfer the pork chops to a baking sheet and bake at 400°F for 10-12 minutes, or until cooked through.
In a saucepan, combine the chopped apples, water, brown sugar, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the apples are soft.
Mash the apples with a fork or potato masher to create a chunky applesauce.
Serve the pork chops with the homemade applesauce on the side.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Pat the chicken dry with paper towels and season the cavity with salt and pepper.
In a small bowl, combine the minced garlic, chopped rosemary, lemon zest, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Rub the garlic-herb mixture all over the chicken, including under the skin.
Truss the chicken with kitchen string and place it on a roasting rack in a baking pan.
Roast the chicken for 1.5 to 2 hours, or until a meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh reads 165°F (75°C).
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

name: Spicy Tuna Poke Bowl
steps: Cook the rice according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a bowl, combine the diced tuna, soy sauce, sesame oil, sriracha, minced garlic, and sesame seeds. Mix well and let marinate for 10 minutes.
In a serving bowl, layer the cooled rice, marinated tuna, diced avocado, shredded carrots, sliced cucumber, and chopped scallions.
Top with toasted sesame seeds and crumbled seaweed sheets.
Serve immediately, with extra soy sauce and sriracha on the side if desired.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, chili powder, and salt for at least 1 hour.
Heat butter in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until lightly browned.
Add tomato puree, garam masala, and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream, cook for 5 more minutes, and serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Lamb Kebabs
steps: Combine ground lamb with chopped onion, cumin, coriander, and salt.
Form the mixture into small patties or skewer them.
Grill or pan-fry the kebabs until fully cooked, about 5-7 minutes per side.
Serve hot with a side of yogurt and mint chutney.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
steps: Combine soy sauce, honey, and grated ginger to make the teriyaki sauce.
Marinate the salmon in the sauce for 15-20 minutes.
Heat a pan and cook the salmon for 3-4 minutes per side, brushing with extra sauce.
Serve garnished with sesame seeds and green onions.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Melt butter in a pan and add minced garlic.
Add the shrimp and cook until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Squeeze in lemon juice and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
Serve immediately over pasta or with crusty bread.

name: Chicken Tikka
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Thread the chicken onto skewers.
Grill or bake the chicken at 400°F for 20-25 minutes, turning halfway through.
Serve hot with lemon wedges and onion slices.

name: Beef and Broccoli
steps: Marinate the beef strips with soy sauce, garlic, and cornstarch for 15 minutes.
Stir-fry the broccoli until tender, then remove from the pan.
Add the beef and cook until browned, then return the broccoli to the pan.
Serve hot, garnished with sesame seeds.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season the fish fillets and cook on a skillet until flaky.
Warm the tortillas and fill with the fish, shredded cabbage, and a squeeze of lime.
Top with sour cream and serve immediately.

name: Baked Honey Mustard Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a bowl, combine honey, mustard, minced garlic, and thyme.
Coat the chicken thighs with the honey-mustard mixture and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh thyme.

name: Crab Cakes
steps: In a bowl, combine crab meat, breadcrumbs, egg, mayonnaise, and mustard.
Form the mixture into small patties.
Cook the patties in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with lemon wedges and tartar sauce.

name: Pork Ramen
steps: Cook the pork belly in a pot until tender, then slice it thinly.
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
In a bowl, combine soy sauce, minced ginger, and hot broth.
Add the noodles, sliced pork, and garnish with chopped scallions.
Serve hot with a soft-boiled egg if desired.
